clear_text: Put the book on the shelf
Place the dishes in the cupboard
Put the shoes in the closet
Store the toys in the toy box
Place the groceries on the kitchen table
Put the keys on the key holder
Pick up the clothes from the floor
Grab the toys and put them in the basket
Pick up the trash and throw it in the bin
Lift the bags and carry them to the kitchen
Pick up the fallen fruits from the table
Grab the newspapers and recycle them
